title: Ivern ability mispell
body: On Ivern's passive, friend of the forest, the word "recieve" is spelt wrong. Just a heads up!

replies.body: I wasn't able to find the word *receive* in his passive ability. Can you screenshot where you're seeing this?

I don't know how to screenshot, but can type it out for you
Friend of the Forest
Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to **"RECIEVE"** gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buff with allies.
I took a look at it and found where it mentions that exact wording in Ivern's champion ability overviews in the summoner profile. Thanks for reporting this, I've passed this feedback on.

How much of a chance do I have of being picked to be a Public Beta Environment tester (PBE)
I have put my application in for more than half a year now. I check everyday, and it is the same everyday. 
How do I higher the chances for being picked?
Ok thank you for reporting this to riot.
The word recieve should be receive.
I don't know how to screenshot, but can type it out for you
Ty for pointing it out, but  I just find it a bit ironic you spelt misspell incorrectly in the title. Dw about me though, just nagging on about spelling.
It is spelled "recieve" on his passive. Not receive.
How is it spelled on his passive? Because if it's spelled "receive", then it's correct.
It is spelled "recieve" on his passive. it should be receive.
